description:
The newspaper office, Tozai Shinbun, plans to publish the Ultimate Menu to commemorate their 100th anniversary. It would not only describe foods but also pass on dietary cultures for many generations to come. Despite its importance, http://anidb.net/ch38190 [Yamaoka Shirou], a lazy employee, and http://anidb.net/ch38191 [Kurita Yuuko], a company newcomer, are selected as the editors.
Source: AnimeNfo
